    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module nukaquant}

    \label{nukaquant}
Nukaquant is a library for technical and quant analysis of stock data. It 
is intended to be used with its companion Marketwatch API library, moira.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Variables                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.Bollinger \textit{(class)}|(}
\subsection{Class Bollinger}

    \label{nukaquant:Bollinger}
Calculates the high and low Bollinger bands for a data stream.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Methods                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsubsection{Methods}

    \label{nukaquant:Bollinger:__init__}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.Bollinger \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.Bollinger.\_\_init\_\_ \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{\_\_init\_\_}(\textit{self}, \textit{mavg\_obj}, \textit{num\_sd}={\tt 2})

\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      \textbf{Parameters}
      \vspace{-1ex}

      \begin{quote}
        \begin{Ventry}{xxxxxxxx}

          \item[mavg\_obj]

          A MovingAverage object containing the data.

        \end{Ventry}

      \end{quote}

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{nukaquant:Bollinger:get_bollinger}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.Bollinger \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.Bollinger.get\_bollinger \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_bollinger}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Returns the high and low Bollinger bands.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      \textbf{Return Value}
    \vspace{-1ex}

      \begin{quote}
      Tuple(lowband, midband, highband)

      \end{quote}

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.Bollinger \textit{(class)}|)}

    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.LocalExtrema \textit{(class)}|(}
\subsection{Class LocalExtrema}

    \label{nukaquant:LocalExtrema}
Attempts to find price pivot points over a given interval in a stream of 
data.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Methods                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsubsection{Methods}

    \label{nukaquant:LocalExtrema:__init__}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.LocalExtrema \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.LocalExtrema.\_\_init\_\_ \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{\_\_init\_\_}(\textit{self}, \textit{auto\_period}={\tt False}, \textit{period}={\tt 20}, \textit{max\_period}={\tt 100}, \textit{dec\_threshold}={\tt 0.05})

\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      \textbf{Parameters}
      \vspace{-1ex}

      \begin{quote}
        \begin{Ventry}{xxxxxxxxxxxxx}

          \item[auto\_period]

          If true, this dynamically increases the period to fit price 
          cycles.

          \item[max\_period]

          The max value that \texttt{auto\_period} will increase the period
          to.

          \item[period]

          Size of window for pivot point determination.

          \item[dec\_threshold]

          Amount of change to happen before the window is decreased. Values
          of 0.4-0.7 will work for volatile stocks.

        \end{Ventry}

      \end{quote}

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{nukaquant:LocalExtrema:add_value}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.LocalExtrema \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.LocalExtrema.add\_value \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{add\_value}(\textit{self}, \textit{value})

\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{nukaquant:LocalExtrema:clear_data}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.LocalExtrema \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.LocalExtrema.clear\_data \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{clear\_data}(\textit{self})

\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

\cline{1-2}

\cline{1-2}

\cline{1-2}
\end{longtable}

    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.MovingAverage \textit{(class)}|(}
\subsection{Class MovingAverage}

    \label{nukaquant:MovingAverage}
Calculates the moving average for a data stream.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Methods                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsubsection{Methods}

    \label{nukaquant:MovingAverage:__init__}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.MovingAverage \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.MovingAverage.\_\_init\_\_ \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{\_\_init\_\_}(\textit{self}, \textit{period}={\tt 30})

\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      \textbf{Parameters}
      \vspace{-1ex}

      \begin{quote}
        \begin{Ventry}{xxxxxx}

          \item[period]

          The number of samples to average; if the actual number of samples
          provided is less than this, the mavg attribute will be the simple
          average.

        \end{Ventry}

      \end{quote}

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{nukaquant:MovingAverage:add_value}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.MovingAverage \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.MovingAverage.add\_value \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{add\_value}(\textit{self}, \textit{value})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Adds a sample to the moving average calculation window.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      \textbf{Parameters}
      \vspace{-1ex}

      \begin{quote}
        \begin{Ventry}{xxxxx}

          \item[value]

          The numerical value of the sample to add.

        \end{Ventry}

      \end{quote}

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{nukaquant:OrderQueue:add_order}
    \index{nukaquant \textit{(module)}!nukaquant.OrderQueue \textit{(class)}!nukaquant.OrderQueue.add\_order \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{add\_order}(\textit{self}, \textit{position}, \textit{type}, \textit{amount}, \textit{price})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Adds an order to the OrderQueue.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      \textbf{Parameters}
      \vspace{-1ex}

      \begin{quote}
        \begin{Ventry}{xxxxxxxx}

          \item[position]

          When to execute the order ('high' or 'low')

          \item[type]

          'Buy', 'Sell', 'Short', or 'Cover'.

          \item[amount]

          Number of securities to order.

        \end{Ventry}

      \end{quote}

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{nukaquant:OrderQueue:clear_orders}
